name: NSTextStorageDelegate
desc: The optional methods that delegates of text storage objects implement to handle text-edit processing.

items.name: func textStorage(NSTextStorage, willProcessEditing: NSTextStorage.EditActions, range: NSRange, changeInLength: Int)
items.desc: The method the framework calls when a text storage object is about to process edits.

items.name: func textStorage(NSTextStorage, didProcessEditing: NSTextStorage.EditActions, range: NSRange, changeInLength: Int)
items.desc: The method the framework calls when a text storage object has finished processing edits.
